Performance:
February 1980: The Battle of Coxinga

Production: February 1980

Play: The Battle of Coxinga (国性爺合戦)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

Characters:

Ri Toten (Ugunshō Ri Tōten / 右軍将李蹈天)

Go Sankei (Shiba shōgun Gosankei / 司馬将軍呉三桂)

Princess Sendan (Sendan Kōjo / 栴檀皇女)

Ryukakun (Ryūkakun / 柳哥君)

An Taijin (An Taijin / 安大人)

Watonai (Watōnai / 和藤内)

Komutsu (Nyōbō Komutsu / 女房小むつ)

Ro Ikkan's wife (Rō Ikkan tsuma / 老一官妻)

Court ladies (Nyokan / 女官)

Beaters (Seko / 勢子)

Retainers (Gunpyō / 軍兵)
